Author: Bizavest Inc.
Title: [ANN]: [Tokensale] [Airdrop] BIZAVEST Analytics Platform With ERC20 Token
Body: Updates on the Ongoing tokensale  1. Pre-sale II ended on 8th June 2018. This was a private phase where we raised a total of 56k USD (in ETH). Most of the funds generated in this phase have been or are being expended on the following:    - Marketing for the current preICO phase    - Organisational operational expenses (rent, bills and salaries mostly)    - Development of the Alpha of Bizavest Platform  ========================================================= The preICO phase has commenced.  The price of Bizacoins for this phase is $0.15 USD per token  Minimum contribution is $15 USD. Bonus Schedule:  $500- $1500.99 = 5% Bonus $1501 - $5000.99 = 10% Bonus $5001 -$15000.99 = 15% Bonus $15000.1 - $30000.99 = 20% Bonus >$30001 = 30% Bonus  All Bonus tokens will be locked for 100 days after sale  How to participate in preICO  1. Register for the sale on  http://bizavest.info and wait for confirmation from the Bizavest Analytics Team (info@bizavest.info) 2. Once confirmed, you will required to complete your KYC registration. Once KYC is carried out, another confirmation mail from the Bizavest Anaytics Team will be sent to you. This will inform you whether your KYC was approved or rejected. 3. Once KYC status is approved, you may proceed to buying Bizacoins via smart contract. -To purchase send desired ETH to the contract address and a   confirmation of your transation will be sent to you with information of how many tokens you should be expecting. - All tokens for the preICO and ICO phases will be sent after conclusion of ICO in September  =========================================================  We apologize for the delay in launching the Bizavest Alpha  We are facing some technical challenges in building and training an Artifical Intelligence machine (Dacomian) from scratch. We lack the capacity in terms of funding and human resource to develop even a fully functional prototype.  However, to maintain your trust in us, and prove that Bizavest Analytics is a workable and fully viable idea, we are moving on with the development of an Alpha app. To remedy our current limitations, we have decided to do the following:  1. Upscale the functionalities of Survstream. We have improved what Survstream can do, rather than just a basic portal/dashboard client application, Survstream has been upgraded to feature a hybrid social media Network site complete with - professional profiling - free and paid data analytics tools, - data marketplace with royalty payment for datafeeders - free and paid polling (basic surveys) - free and paid business intelligence consultancy etc.  2. Survstream will also feature a portfolio system where consultants and business research experts can be hired fo microservices and/or freelance basis.  3. Finally, Survstream will be integrating a CRM functionality where customers/clients of particular organisations can access and view all the information about them that a company has and the company can pay for those information which they choose to keep/use.  We will still continue with the development of Dacomain and keep true to the original Bizavest Analytics idea. Furthermore, we have started the process of developing our own blockchain platform which will invariably host most of the functionalities of Bizavest.  In addition, in our bid to run a successful tokensale and float a revolutionary startup, we have been talking to some prominent companies on the blockchain and we will be announcing new partnerships very soon.   We are hiring!!! 1. Brand Ambassadors 2. Blockchain Developers 3. Community Managers 4. Content Developers If you have skills in the above areas/categories, please send a CV/portfolio information to admin@bizavest.info. Also, if you have any relevant blockchain skills that you feel would help us succeed and you would like to be a part of the Bizavest Team you may also apply.

Body: ***IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENTS***  First and foremost, we made a statement on Dec. 27 2017... We said that if support from the community is still as low by this time; as it was then, we would reduce the airdrop amount by half. As can be observed by everyone, we still do not have a community that is supportive to any level of adequacy...  We believe that this implies that most people here are only in for airdrops (which we are quite fine with) that they would dump at the first opportunity to make a quick $5 (which we do not support).  We at Bizavest believe in rewarding support and participation as this is what our entire platform and model is built on top...  It saddens me therefore to announce that airdrop amount has been halfed for the second time to only 250 Bizacoin tokens per registrant.  Note, there is a total amount of airdrop tokens allocated already and we will be using this token for participatory rewards rather than mere airdrops over a period of three to six months   The second piece of announcement is that due to a.) low participation in the pre-sale exercise (we are still at 7% of our target) and;  b.) problems with the ethereum network in the past which has led to complaints from prospective investors of not being able to participate in pre-sale  We have decided to extend pre-sale exercise by exactly one week. This means that the pre-sale will now be ending on the 24th of January, 2018.  The third information we wish to pass across come in the form of dates and proposed schedules for important events:  1. Holder's airdrop: as we have severally announced, we will be giving Bizc tokens to existing holders of Bizc tokens in form of a holder's airdrop. We would send 25% of your existing token amount to you as airdrop.  This airdrop applies to every one who has more than 50 Bizc token in their accounts by Friday, 19th January, 2018 when snapshot will be taken.  If you wish to earn Bizc tokens in this way, we advise that you purchase some via pre-sale. By doing so, you will be helping us grow and achieve our dreams and also helping yourself to make a great investment.  ***Spreadsheet for holder's airdrop will be released on Saturday the 20th after snapshot on Friday  Distribution will follow for the next 2-3 days after  2. Whitepaper: We have been working really hard on a comprehensive whitepaper and would release on between tomorrow and next  3. Regular Airdrop: Regular airdrop; which is opened to everyone who registered properly, will start on February 3rd, 2018 and span about 8 days to 2 weeks. Registrations for regular airdrop will close on 31st of January and Spreadsheet will be released on the 2nd of February, 2017  4. Bounties: Telegram bounty spreadsheet will be released in a day or two. Twitter bounty rewards will be paid after holder's airdrop is completed. Other bounties are still ongoing or incoming:smile:  5. Exchanges: We have applied to a number of exchanges (we cannot disclose which until approval is granted:sweat_smile:) but we can state that many of this exchanges require a listing fee which is quite expensive sometimes. :sweat_smile:. This is one of the reasons why we staged a pre-sale. Our plan is to be listed on at least four exchanges by February. Again we call on the community to support us by contributing in Pre-sale. Even the small ETH you have would be enough to go a long way in pushing us to the top.
